title: Veera Vinayaka Lyrics Vedalam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Veera Vinayaka
Singer: Anirudh, Vishal Dadlani
Lyrics: Viveka
Movie: Vedalam
Ganapathi baapaa moriya..

[
Veera vinayaka
vettri vinayaka
shakthi vinayaka
paerazhaga

Theera sandhosamum
thiththikkum vaarthaiyum
eththikkum thondrida
venumaiyya
] (2)

Eesan pettra aasai maganae
eedu inayae illa thunaiyae

Naadu nagaram sezhikkum,
unnai naadi vandhor
vazhakai uyarum

hey nee poodhu velaasu
nee poondhu velaasu
kondaadu idhu urchaaga neram.

hey nee vuttu velaasu
vaa vuttu velaasu
kondaadu ini kooththaadum
kaalam..

[
Veera vinayaka
vettri vinayaka
shakthi vinayaka
paerazhaga

Theera sandhosamum
thiththikkum vaarthaiyum
eththikkum thondrida
venumaiyya
] (2)

Beerangiyaal
nee vellaadhadhum
un paeranbinaal
ada kaikoodumey.

Hey dharaalamaa
nee nesam vachchaa
ada thaarumaara
manam kooththaadumey

seerippaakkum
aalu munnae
sirichu paaru maariduvaan
kolandhai pola
manasu irundha
kollai inbam
paarhtidalaam

hey nee poodhu velaasu
nee poondhu velaasu
kondaadu idhu urchaaga neram.

hey nee vuttu velaasu
vaa vuttu velaasu
kondaadu ini kooththaadum
kaalam..

[
Veera vinayaka
vettri vinayaka
shakthi vinayaka
paerazhaga

Theera sandhosamum
thiththikkum vaarthaiyum
eththikkum thondrida
venumaiyya
] (2)

Eesan pettra aasai maganae
eedu inayae illa thunaiyae

Naadu nagaram sezhikkum,
unnai naadi vandhor
vazhakai uyarum

hey nee poodhu velaasu
nee poondhu velaasu
kondaadu idhu urchaaga neram.

hey nee vuttu velaasu
vaa vuttu velaasu
kondaadu ini kooththaadum
kaalam..

hey veera vinayaga.
..
Ganapathi baapaa moriya..
